segments.text: I see the little girl standing there, waiting for her brother to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is outstretched, and she’s watching him carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever fallen trying to get cookies like this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s standing close enough to catch him if he falls, but I doubt she could.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s looking at the jar makes me think she really wants one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t get in trouble when their mother turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is getting closer to her, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so focused on the cookies that she doesn’t notice the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at her determination.
segments.speaker: PAR
